snippet: Citibank is the second major bank to replace cards since the data breach was disclosed last month.
abstract: Citibank plans to reissue all customer debit cards involved in data breach at Target, making it second major bank to do so since attack was disclosed in December 2013.
lead_paragraph: Citibank is the second major bank to replace cards since the data breach was disclosed last month.

headline.main: Theft at Target Leads Citi to Replace Debit Cards
headline.print_headline: Theft at Target Leads Citi to Replace Debit Cards
